name: Venomspitter
description: A grotesquely bloated rat the size of a small dog, its body slick and covered in pulsing pustules. Eight thick tentacles sprout from its back, twitching with barely contained energy. When agitated, these appendages lash out, dripping venom.

flavor.rationale: Spawned as part of a MOB_INVASION event. The Venomspitter is a result of the Zenith-9 Corporation's failed experiments in bio-weapon development. Released into the city sewers after an accident, they now thrive on vermin and occasionally attack citizens.
